levels.name: Clicker
levels.description: Clicks automatically once per second. Deactivates after a minute from last click.

levels.name: Double Clicker
levels.description: Clicks automatically twice per second. Deactivates after 10 minutes from last click.

levels.name: Triple Clicker
levels.description: Clicks four times per second. Deactivates after an hour from last click.

levels.name: Quad Clicker
levels.description: Clicks eight times per second. Deactivates after a 12 hours from last click.

levels.name: Penta Clicker
levels.description: Clicks twelve times per second. Deactivates after a day from last click.
